price: Rabbiin gabbaraa amantii isaaf qulqulleessoo tahaatii. Odoo kaafirtoonni jibbanillee.
arabic: فَٱدۡعُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-id'ʿū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
